column5: Curious after looking at map on how much shorter of a drive than going all the way up to Northwestern Ontario Any one been up that way or have any reports Thanks

Fished with white river air 4 times. Fly ins. Pretty good fishing for numbers and would always get a 27 inch eye or two and a 38-40 inch northern. good outfitter with decent service and equipment. would go back again but go to a private camp now. eric

Have gone up to Happy Day Lodge the last few years (about 2 hours east of Wawa). www.happydaylodge.com Is a "drive-in" and is the only camp on this lake - will be going back (wasn't able to do so this year). Good fishing and very clean camp with good owners....very nice lake and can get off by yourself. It's worth checking out, though do so soon, as they always have a very high rebooking rate and it's often hard to get a cabin by this time of the year. Good luck with your search....feel free to email me if you have any questions. Rich B

This will be our 4th year going up to Happy Day Lodge. I agree with everything Rich said. We always do well but it helps to know where to fish. Lots of walleye, pike and smallmouth. Big lakers and whitefish too. Taz

http://www.outpostcamps.com/ - Anjigaming Lakehttp://www.canadianfishing.com/ Fished both at pelows for 15 years and lake anjigamin when pellows owned it, he sold off the fly outs. Anjigimin is a great pike and walleye lake

We fly out of Wawa to Pine Portage lodge on kabinakagami lake. This year will be the 7th time. Great place and good to excellent fishing. plent of walleye between 14-22 with bigger ones now and then. We always catch a few pike in the high 30's to low 40's.
Thanks for input guys May try a second trip in the fall this year and seeing how this is much closer It may make it all that more easy to do

RG, Last July we went up for a week and fished the Whitefish/Manitowik lake system. It is 20 minutes east of Wawa. The fishing was tough the first few days as it is a lot of water to cover. Once we found the spots the fishing was quite good.
